text:
Thanks, Amana.
How are you feeling?

I'm feeling great!
I'm really excited, it's our training camp after all!

Hiori-chan, your hair might be tangled a bit
around the knot.

Oh, you're right...
I didn't notice, thank you.

Amana, I brought a hair iron with me.
Do you want to use it later?

Huh...
It's okay, it was just tangled...!

...You brought a hair iron too, huh? You're not skimping
on style even during the training camp.

I brought cute pajamas too~
I'll be all set until night~

Pajamas...!?
Wow... I never even thought about that...

Well, want to try them out a bit?
They're really comfy, so you'll sleep well.
